## From Rmarkdwon to Quarto

- Quarto offers many out of the box features, Rmarkdown must use extension packages
- Quarto is multi-language and multi engine, other languages can be used. This fits quite well a company like Mirai Solutions
- Easy migration, easy compatibility with Markdown and Jupyther, low effort
